mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VisitorBlackList (VisitorID, AdminID, blacklistState, blacklistReason, Desc, planFromDate, planToDate, modifedDate, InsertDate) VALUES (#{visitorId}, #{adminId}, #{blacklistState}, #{blacklistReason}, #{blacklistReasonComment}, #{planFromDate}, #{planToDate}, GETDATE(), GETDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE VisitorBlackList SET AdminID = #{adminId}, blacklistState = #{blacklistState}, blacklistReason = #{blacklistReason}, [Desc] = #{blacklistReasonComment}, planFromDate = #{planFromDate}, planToDate = #{planToDate}, modifedDate = GETDATE() WHERE VisitorID = #{visitorId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM VisitorBlackList vbl JOIN Visitor v ON vbl.VisitorID = v.VisitorID

SELECT * FROM VisitorBlackList vbl JOIN Visitor v ON vbl.VisitorID = v.VisitorID WHERE vbl.VisitorID = #{visitorId} AND
( CONVERT(varchar(50), vbl.planFromDate, 23) <= CONVERT(varchar(50), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{date}), 23) AND CONVERT(varchar(50), vbl.planToDate, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(50), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{date}), 23) )
